fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 A three-night stay at the Hotel Twenty One in Brighton costs £120 per room, including breakfast. For this and other similar offers contact Visit Brighton (0906 711 2255) Under £300 Spruce up for spring with a retreat weekend at Oxon Hoath in Hadlow, Kent, from 18-20 February. The cost of £299 includes two nights' full-board (£16 single supplement), vegetarian cuisine, Pilates classes and therapy treatments. Contact Sarah (020 7722 4373) Under £400 Shopping addicts will love a break to New York with British Airways Holidays (0870 243 3406). Three nights' half-board at the three-star Hotel Metro costs £310, including flights. Based on departures to 26 February. Under £600 Barbados is hot this winter. First Choice (0870 8503929) offers 14 nights' self-catering at the Silver Sands Resort in Christchurch for £533pp, including flights. Under £1,000 Explore Ecuador with Bridge the World (0870 814 6318) from £979pp. The price includes flights and seven nights at the Café Cultura in Quito and the Hotel Santa Lucia in Cuenca. Valid until 16 March. Under £2,500 Beaches, whales and walks are part of a 13-day (land-only) holiday to Guadelope from 22 February with Kudu Travel (01722 782982). The £2,490 price includes hotels and transport.
